item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hollywood/Celebrity Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor with a passion for the Hollywood/celebrity niche. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase the glamour and excitement of the entertainment industry. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding special effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' specifications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to work independently to meet tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Knowledge of video editing software

Description
Video Duration 15-20 minutes
Pay-$15

Join our team and showcase your editing skills in the Hollywood/celebrity niche!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 21, 2024 08:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor with 2D Graphics Experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who has experience in adding 2D graphics to videos. The editor will be responsible for enhancing our video content by incorporating visually appealing graphics that align with our brand. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing software and be proficient in creating and editing 2D graphics. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role. This is a great opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of our brand. Start your reply with SEO written backwards.

I will provide the video and only minor edits are required. Happy to do the job as fixed price.

Skills required:

- Video editing
- 2D graphics design
- Proficient in video editing software
- Creativity
- Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $4.00-$25.00

item.title: Youtube video creators. Magnates Media style video quality. Script and voiceover included. - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for Youtube animation video creators. Looking for "magnates media" documentary video style and shorts creators. This includes Magnates Media style voiceover and a natural script. We will give creators titles for the videos, and seller will create the video. No reused content or copywritten material. We want the videos to be at least 10 minutes long. That's $25 per video, and $1 per short.  Message us if you're able to meet all requirements without question. Absolutely, do not respond to this post if your intentions are to sell us reused copywritten content.  Do not respond if you can't meet all qualifications.

Budget: $25

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:30AM to 6:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $10.00

item.title: Social Media Video Editor [Arabic Language] - Upwork
item.description:
Hi There,

Please read the full job description prior to applying to this post to ensure we're a match!

Who We Are:
We Are Imfluence!
Imfluence is an independent tech-driven influencer marketing agency. We specialize in influencer marketing, talent management and social media. We drive impact and influence to the influencers and brands we work with by creating content that makes a difference.

What This Role Involves:
This role is an opportunity for a full time hire remotely from anywhere in the world. We're looking for talented individuals who can help us edit social media videos in multiple formats. Within this role you will:

1. Edit a set of content based on a script
2. Add some b roll footage and animations
3. Add subtitles based on the provided script in Arabic
4. Edit videos based on feedback (as many rounds as needed)

What A Successful Candidate Looks Like:
1. Native Arabic Speaker
2. Previous Experience in Editing Social Media Videos
3. Ability to Quickly Turnaround Videos Under Tight Timelines
4. Ability to Self Manage Workload

The Content You'll Be Creating:
The content you'll be creating will be related to economy, finance and statistics researching the latest news and trends. The content will be used as social media videos in Arabic that have a duration of 30 - 90 seconds in various sizes and formats.

How We'll Shortlist Candidates:
1. Please submit sample work of a video you've edited for social media in the field of economy or finance
2. We will then reach out to you for a quick assignment where you will need to edit a video based on footage and a script we provide
3. If you are shortlisted, we will then schedule a Zoom interview for 15 minutes to chat and send you an offer

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 21, 2024 07:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Arabic, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Sound Design
Skills: Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Arabic, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Sound Design
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.description:
I need someone to create some fashion video ads from t shirt mockups I will provide.

Simple and straightforward task if you know how to do it. I will send you high quality t shirt designs/mockups and you will make a video with cool transitions and effects and trendy music.  $50 for three ads

To put the shirt design on the video, you can also use https://placeit.net/mockups/merch-videos (I will buy a subscription if that's needed). Please send samples of any apparel/fashion ads you've made before.

item.title: Voiceover Artist for YouTube Tutorial and Narration Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented voiceover artist to provide narration for our YouTube tutorial and narration videos. The ideal candidate will have a captivating and engaging voice, with excellent pronunciation and diction skills. The voiceover artist will be responsible for recording and editing voiceover tracks that will be synchronized with the video content. The videos will cover a range of topics, including educational tutorials, product reviews, and storytelling. We're looking for someone who can bring our videos to life and create a professional and polished final product. This is a great opportunity for a voiceover artist to showcase their talent and reach a wide audience. Join our team and help us create engaging and informative videos that will captivate our viewers.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 07:22 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Narration, US English Dialect, Male
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Narration, US English Dialect, Male
Country: Australia

item.title: Camtasia Video Editor for Online Course - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a Camtasia video editor for our online training lessons. Need to have the latest version of Camtasia.

We have about ~38 videos that need to be edited. We'll share the raw Camtasia files with you.
The footage needs to be edited in 4k.
The footage is a combination of screen share, webcam, and audio.

The workflow would include the following tasks:
- Cut out bad takes and sections
- Alternate between screen share, webcam, and a combination of both
- Add minimal pre-made overlay graphics where needed
- Add a circle cutout filter to webcam footage on certain sections
- Ensure audio is clean and crisp

We want the final Camtasia edit file and the final exported 4k mp4 file as deliverables.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 07:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Screencasting Video
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Screencasting Video
Country: United States
click to apply
